description.brief: Red veined, tightly curled purple leaves.
description.verbose: Remarkably attractive dark green kale with red veined, frilly, tightly curled leaves. A vigorous performer with good cold tolerance. Leaves darken to deep scarlet in late season. Begin harvesting leaves when young, and allow plant to grow well into the early winter. 24-36 inches tall by 24 inches wide, 60 days from transplant. 11,000 seeds/oz
